open.title: Vumatel Outage | Sunny Ridge
open.description: Vumatel has informed us of a network outage affecting Sunny Ridge, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.

updates.content: Delft will be put on hold due to hostility with local gangs. No maintenance and installations will take place. Contractors are not able to enter the area.

open.title: Vumatel| KwaZulu Natal
open.description: Afrihost & Vumatel is conducting maintenance on Tuesday, 10/14/2025, 12:01 AM - 5:00 AM. Users affected will experience limited to no connectivity for a short period during the maintenance window. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Metrofibre Maintenance | Rietvalleirand
open.description: Metrofibre is conducting maintenance in Rietvalleirand on the 13/10/2025 to 22/10/2025 from 07:00 to 16:00 daily, users affected will experience limited to no connectivity for a short period during the maintenance window. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Metrofibre| Daspoort
open.description: Metrofibre is conducting maintenance in Daspoort from Tuesday, 30th September 2025, at 08:00 to Friday, 17th October 2025, at 17:00 GMT +2 daily. Users affected will experience limited to no connectivity during the maintenance window. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

closed.title: Afrihost Fibre Outage | All Regions
closed.description: We are investigating reports of limited to no connectivity affecting clients on the Afrihost Fibre network in all regions. We are working on identifying and resolving this issue as quickly as possible. We apologise for any inconvenience that this may be causing.

updates.content: The outage has been resolved and our system and network engineers are diagnosing the root cause of the outage.
